thread.title: Former Beverly Hills Compound of Danny DeVito and Rhea Perlman Asks $85 Million

author: Katherine Clarke
title: Former Beverly Hills Compound of Danny DeVito and Rhea Perlman Asks $85 Million
text:
A Beverly Hills compound that was once home to actors Danny DeVito and Rhea Perlman is coming on the market for $85 million.
Mr. DeVito and Ms. Perlman sold the home for about $28 million in 2015. Its current owners, real-estate developers Stuart and Stephanie Liner, extensively renovated the property for an undisclosed sum, increasing the total square footage across four structures to around 29,000 square feet.
